data.additional_notes:
#### SDHQ's Build Score Breakdown


Death Stranding: Director's Cut is an awesome game and it can be played, but there will be a lot of issues later in the game on Steam Deck.
- **Performance:** ★★☆☆☆ (2/5)
- **Visuals:** ★★★☆☆ (3/5)
- **Stability:** ★★☆☆☆ (2/5)
- **Controls:** ★★★☆☆ (3/5)
- **Battery:** ★★☆☆☆ (2/5)
